sn46.42:1.1: “Mendicants, when a Wheel Turning Monarch appears seven treasures appear.
sn46.42:1.3: The wheel, the elephant, the horse, the jewel, the woman, the treasurer, and the counselor.
sn46.42:1.4: When a Wheel Turning Monarch appears these seven treasures appear.
sn46.42:2.1: When a Realized One, a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha appears the seven treasures of the awakening factors appear.
sn46.42:2.3: The treasures of the awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
sn46.42:2.4: When a Realized One, a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha appears these seven treasures of the awakening factors appear.”
